subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Mardy Fish beat the hard-serving Ivo Karlovic, 7-6 (3), 6-4, in a Pilot Pen semifinal in New Haven to advance to his first final this year.
snippet: Mardy Fish beat the hard-serving Ivo Karlovic, 7-6 (3), 6-4, in a Pilot Pen semifinal in New Haven to advance to his first final this year.
